issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description: See TIMOB-15402.  This issue was reported with an Alloy test case but was closed without a fix in Alloy.  I've submitted a pull request (https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/293) that fixes the problem, but Tony needs an ALOY ticket so he can add it to the current release/sprint.  Thanks!
fields.summary: Unable to add NavigationWindow to Popover in Alloy

comments.body:
h3. code

PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/293
test app: https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/tree/master/test/apps/ui/popover

h3. functional test

# Run the test app for ipad
# confirm that both popovers open correctly
# Confirm that the second popover has a 2-window navigation embedded inside of it

Tested using the app : https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/tree/master/test/apps/ui/popover
Both the popovers are opening correctly and second popover has 2-window navigation embedded inside of it
Verified the fix on:
SDK: 3.3.0.v20140507163312
CLI version : 3.3.0-dev
OS : MAC OSX 10.9.2
Alloy:  1.4.0-dev
ACS: 1.0.14
npm:1.3.2
LiveView: 1.0.4
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201405080918
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.1
XCode : 5.1.1
